channel.title: Allstar Source Project Help
channel.description: Hey Mopar! I am working on an Allstar source because I just started coding. And if you know me, you know I don't want to be spoon-fed, but I came across this problem and I am stuck. I have tried many things and I post here as a last resort. So, here is my problem. EDIT: I have found out on my own how to get rid of the text below the skull, but I have not found out how to get rid of the skull. My screen now looks like this: [img]http://i42.tinypic.com/34509y1.png[/img] Does anyone know how to get rid of that skull? I have tried everything I can think of and I have even gotten rid of the text on my own. Thank you guys for your time and support! :)

item.title: Allstar Source Project Help
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

ArticBlooms:

All though that may be true, the interfaces, sloppy code, and custom items/areas can always be programmed to look neater and that will make it a better server over all, imo. Im not going to host or release this, I just want to learn rsps on my own and acquire more knowledge in java programming.

If you want to learn the right way to do things in JAVA, but using a RSPS to teach you, i suggest using a hyperion source. They are way cleaner, and better coded.

Read full topic

item.title: Allstar Source Project Help
item.dc:creator: @Daginith Daginith
item.description:
@Daginith wrote:

ArticBlooms:

I want it to look as far away from an Allstar as possible though. I know it tells you, but I can just look in the code and find the Wilderness spots and remove them if I want.

trust me, it will always look like an allstar no matter how much you code it. (i.e. The npchandler, the gs/weapon stances, npc updating, drops…etc)

Read full topic

item.description:
@ArticBlooms wrote:

This skull is in the lower right hand corner of the screen. It is not the skull above your character.

item.title: Allstar Source Project Help
item.dc:creator: @ArticBlooms ArticBlooms
item.description:
@ArticBlooms wrote:

Hey Mopar! I am working on an Allstar source because I just started coding. And if you know me, you know I don’t want to be spoon-fed, but I came across this problem and I am stuck. I have tried many things and I post here as a last resort. So, here is my problem.
EDIT: I have found out on my own how to get rid of the text below the skull, but I have not found out how to get rid of the skull. My screen now looks like this:

Does anyone know how to get rid of that skull? I have tried everything I can think of and I have even gotten rid of the text on my own. Thank you guys for your time and support!

Read full topic
